title: Rockin' Spring
description: IT Analyst, Lexi Carter, is getting tired of her boring routine. When a mysterious stranger moves to town, she's immediately attracted to him.Retired musician, Damien St. James, moves to Lexi's small town to escape his former life. Dark, handsome, and brooding, women are powerless against his charm, but he's not looking for a relationship.Will Lexi overcome her shyness and make contact with Damien? Will Damien change his stance against commitment? Or will these two strangers miss their chance? Not if their dogs have any say in the matter!
author: Samantha C. Michaels
